overview: Claudio Abbado, conductor; Angela Gheorghiu, soprano; Daniela Bercellona, mezzo-soprano; Roberto Alagna, tenor; Julian Konstantinov, bass. Swedish Radio Chorus, Eric Ericson Chamber Choir, Orfeon Nonostiarra, Berliner Philharmoniker.  Live recording at performances to mark the centenary of Verdi's death. Jan. 25 & 27, 2001.
tagline: Liver recording at performances to mark the centenary of Verdi's death.
title: Giuseppe Verdi Messa da Requiem
